lessons.title: The Unit Circle
lessons.summary: Build angle and coordinate intuition with radians and key unit-circle points.

lessons.title: Trigonometric Functions of Real Numbers
lessons.summary: Evaluate and interpret trig functions beyond first-quadrant angles.

lessons.title: Trigonometric Graphs
lessons.summary: Graph sine, cosine, and tangent using amplitude, period, and phase ideas.

lessons.title: More Trigonometric Graphs
lessons.summary: Work with secant, cosecant, cotangent, and transformed trig graphs.

lessons.title: Inverse Trigonometric Functions and Their Graphs
lessons.summary: Use inverse trig functions, domains, ranges, and graph relationships.

lessons.title: Modeling Harmonic Motion
lessons.summary: Model periodic phenomena with sinusoidal equations and parameters.
